title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.53 - Vehicles lacking valid registration plate barred; exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.53 - Vehicles lacking valid registration plate barred; exceptions

State Regulations

Except for vehicles owned by the government of the

United States, and horse-drawn vehicles, no highway vehicle shall be permitted
in the terminal unless a currently effective registration plate duly issued by
appropriate governmental authority is attached thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.53

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
